Class.Name: ArchDocHandler
Class.Oneliner: SAX DocumentHandler for processing XML architectures.

Method.Name: __init__
Method.Oneliner: Initialize a new instance.

Method.Name: add_document_handler
Method.Oneliner: Add an architecture document handler.

Description.P: This method adds the DocumentHandler to the architecture's list of architectural event listeners.

Method.Name: characters
Method.Oneliner: Handle a character data event.

Method.Name: clear_document_handlers
Method.Oneliner: Remove all registered architecture document handlers.

Description.P: This method removes all DocumentHandlers in the architecture's list of architectural event listeners.

Method.Name: endDocument
Method.Oneliner: Handle an event for the end of a document.

Method.Name: endElement
Method.Oneliner: Handle an event for the end of an element.

Method.Name: get_architecture
Method.Oneliner: Get the Architecture object for a given architecture.

Description.P: The Architecture object will allow you to get information about the architecture and information about its parse state.

Method.Name: ignorableWhitespace
Method.Oneliner: Handle an event for ignorable whitespace in element content.

Method.Name: processingInstruction
Method.Oneliner: Handle a processing instruction event.

Method.Name: remove_document_handler
Method.Oneliner: Remove an architecture document handler.

Description.P: This method removes all occurences of the DocumentHandler in the architecture's list of architectural event listeners.

Method.Name: scan_arch_attrs
Method.Oneliner: Scan an elements attributes for architectural information, and return a modified set of attributes.

Description.P: arch must be an object that implements the Architecture interface. org_attrs must be a hash containing attribute name/values.

Method.Name: setDocumentLocator
Method.Oneliner: Receive an object for locating the origin of SAX document events.

Method.Name: set_debug_level
Method.Oneliner: Set the debug level and the debug file.

Description.P: Debug information is by default written to sys.stderr when debugging is active. This can be changed by specifying the debug_file parameter with a file object. The default debug level is 0, i.e no debugging information is written.

Method.Name: set_default_document_handler
Method.Oneliner: Set a default document handler that receives the same events as this class.

Description.P: A default DocumentHandler is only used if you want the incoming events passed on to another DocumentHandler.

Method.Name: startDocument
Method.Oneliner: Handle an event for the beginning of a document.

Method.Name: startElement
Method.Oneliner: Handle an event for the beginning of an element.

Description.P: This class is responsible for doing architectural processing of all SAX events that it receives.

The ArchDocHandler instance must be registered with a parser that triggers SAX events during parsing. This is usually done by calling the parsers
setDocumentHandler method.

DocumentHandlers that is interested in listening to architectural events must register itself using the add_document_handler method of the ArchDocHandler instance. They may remove themselves by calling remove_document_handler .
All registered DocumentHandlers can be removed by calling clear_document_handlers .

Method.Name: endElement
Method.Oneliner: Handle an event for the end of an element.

Method.Name: ignorableWhitespace
Method.Oneliner: Handle an event for ignorable whitespace in element content.

Method.Name: processingInstruction
Method.Oneliner: Handle a processing instruction event.

Method.Name: endDocument
Method.Oneliner: Handle an event for the end of a document.

Method.Name: characters
Method.Oneliner: Handle a character data event.

Method.Name: startDocument
Method.Oneliner: Handle an event for the beginning of a document.

Method.Name: setDocumentLocator
Method.Oneliner: Receive an object for locating the origin of SAX document events.

Method.Name: startElement
Method.Oneliner: Handle an event for the beginning of an element.

Method.Name: __init__
Method.Oneliner: Intitialize a new instance.

Method.Name: __str__
Method.Oneliner: Create a string representation of the exception.

Method.Name: get_exception
Method.Oneliner: Return the embedded exception, if any.

Method.Name: get_message
Method.Oneliner: Return a message for this exception.

Description.P: Creates an exception. The message is required, but the exception can be None.

Method.Name: getMessage
Method.Oneliner: Return a message for this exception.

Method.Name: __str__
Method.Oneliner: Create a string representation of the exception.

Method.Name: getException
Method.Oneliner: Return the embedded exception, if any.

Class.Name: ArchParseState
Class.Oneliner: Class representing parsing state with regard to XML architectures.

Method.Oneliner: Initialize a new instance.

Method.Oneliner: Add an attribute as a target of the mapping of the content.

Method.Name: add_CONTENT_value
Method.Oneliner: Add value to mapped #CONTENT content.

Method.Oneliner: Get mapped #ARCCONT content.

Method.Name: get_CONTENT_value
Method.Oneliner: Get mapped #CONTENT content.

Method.Name: get_attributes
Method.Oneliner: Get the attributes.

Method.Name: get_elem_form
Method.Oneliner: Get the element form

Method.Name: get_ignore_data
Method.Oneliner: Get the ignore data state.

Method.Name: get_parent
Method.Oneliner: Get the parent state.

Method.Name: get_parent_suppression
Method.Oneliner: Get the suppression state of the parent.

Method.Name: get_renamer
Method.Oneliner: Get the renamer.

Method.Name: get_seen_id
Method.Oneliner: Get the seen id flag.

Method.Name: get_suppression
Method.Oneliner: Get the suppression state.

Method.Name: is_ARCCONT_active
Method.Oneliner: Returns true if an attribute value should be mapped to content.

Method.Name: is_CONTENT_active
Method.Oneliner: Returns true if content should be mapped to attribute(s).

Method.Name: set_ARCCONT_value
Method.Oneliner: Set mapped #ARCCONT content.

Method.Name: set_attribute_value
Method.Oneliner: Set a attribute value.

Method.Name: set_attributes
Method.Oneliner: Set the attributes.

Method.Name: set_elem_form
Method.Oneliner: Set the element form.

Method.Name: set_ignore_data
Method.Oneliner: Set the ignore data state.

Method.Name: set_parent
Method.Oneliner: Set the parent state.

Method.Name: set_renamer
Method.Oneliner: Set the renamer.

Method.Name: set_seen_id
Method.Oneliner: Set the seen id flag.

Method.Name: set_suppression
Method.Oneliner: Set a new suppression state.

Class.Name: Architecture
Class.Oneliner: Class that represents an XML architecture.

Method.Name: __init__
Method.Oneliner: Initialize a new instance.

Method.Name: get_auto
Method.Oneliner: Get the architecture automatic form mapping type.

Method.Name: get_bridge_form
Method.Oneliner: Get the architecture bridge form name.

Method.Name: get_broadcaster
Method.Oneliner: Get the current event broadcaster.

Description.P: The default broadcaster is xml.sax.saxutils.EventBroadcaster([]).

Method.Name: get_data_form
Method.Oneliner: Get the architecture data form name.

Method.Name: get_doc_elem_form
Method.Oneliner: Get the architecture document element form name.

Method.Name: get_dtd_public_id
Method.Oneliner: Get the public identifier of the architectural meta-DTD.

Method.Name: get_dtd_system_id
Method.Oneliner: Get the system identifier of the architectural meta-DTD.

Method.Name: get_form_att
Method.Oneliner: Get the architectural form attribute name.

Method.Name: get_ignore_data_att
Method.Oneliner: Get the architecture ignore data attribute name.

Method.Name: get_name
Method.Oneliner: Get the architecture name.

Method.Name: get_parse_state
Method.Oneliner: Get the architecture parse_state.

Method.Name: get_public_id
Method.Oneliner: Get the public identifier of the architecture specification document.

Method.Name: get_renamer_att
Method.Oneliner: Get the architectural attribute renamer attribute name.

Method.Name: get_suppressor_att
Method.Oneliner: Get the architecture suppressor attribute name.

Method.Name: is_declared
Method.Oneliner: Has the architecture been declared?

Method.Name: load
Method.Oneliner: Load information about the architecture based on preparsed attribute list.

Description.P: The prepared attribute list usually comes from the architecture use declaration. You may also supply your own when needed. This is more or less the same as using the setter/getter methods.

Method.Name: reset
Method.Oneliner: Reset the architecure.

Description.P: This method clears all architectual information stored within the Architecture object.

get_name(), get_public_id(), get_dtd_public_id(), get_dtd_system_id(), get_form_att(), get_renamer_att(), get_suppressor_att, get_ignore_data_att(), get_doc_elem_form(), get_bridge_form(), get_data_form(), get_auto is set to None. is_declared() returns 0.

Method.Name: set_auto
Method.Oneliner: Set the architecture automatic form mapping type.

Method.Name: set_bridge_form
Method.Oneliner: Set the architecture bridge form name.

Method.Name: set_broadcaster
Method.Oneliner: Set the event broadcaster to use.

Description.P: The default broadcaster is xml.sax.saxutils.EventBroadcaster([]). See the python SAX modules for more information about EventBroadcaster.

Method.Name: set_data_form
Method.Oneliner: Set the architecture data form name.

Method.Name: set_doc_elem_form
Method.Oneliner: Set the architecture document element form name.

Method.Name: set_dtd_public_id
Method.Oneliner: Set the public identifier of the architectural meta-DTD.

Method.Name: set_dtd_system_id
Method.Oneliner: Set the system identifier of the architectural meta-DTD.

Method.Name: set_form_att
Method.Oneliner: Set the architectural form attribute name.

Method.Name: set_ignore_data_att
Method.Oneliner: Set the architecture ignore data attribute name.

Method.Name: set_name
Method.Oneliner: Set the architecture name.

Method.Name: set_parse_state
Method.Oneliner: Set the architecture parse_state.

Method.Name: set_public_id
Method.Oneliner: Set the public identifier of the architecture specification document.

Method.Name: set_renamer_att
Method.Oneliner: Set the architectural attribute renamer attribute name.

Method.Name: set_suppressor_att
Method.Oneliner: Set the architecture suppressor attribute name.

Class.Name: AttributeParser
Class.Oneliner: Class used for parsing attribute specification strings.

Method.Oneliner: Initialize a new instance.

Method.Oneliner: Parse the attribute specification string.

Method.Oneliner: Read attribute name.

Method.Oneliner: Read attribute value.

Method.Name: skip_equal
Method.Oneliner: Skip equal sign.

Method.Name: skip_whitespace
Method.Oneliner: Skip whitespace.

Description.P: xmlarch uses it to parse the data part of processing instructions (the architectural use declaration).

Description.P: Version 0.20 (October 18th 1998)
Copyright (C) 1998 by Geir O. Grønmo, grove@infotek.no
Free for commercial and non-commercial use.

The xmlarch module contains an XML architectural forms processor written in Python. It allows you to process XML architectural forms using any parser that uses the SAX interfaces. The module allow you to process several architectures in one parse pass.
Architectural document events for an architecture can even be broadcasted to multiple DocumentHandlers.
